name: Loki
summary_text: The mercurial villain Loki resumes his role as the God of Mischief in a new series that takes place after the events of “Avengers: Endgame.”

name: In the Heights
summary_text: A film version of the Broadway musical in which Usnavi, a sympathetic New York bodega owner, saves every penny every day as he imagines and sings about a better life.

name: Sweet Tooth
summary_text: A boy who is half human and half deer survives in a post-apocalyptic world with other hybrids.

name: The Handmaid's Tale
summary_text: Set in a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship.

name: Manifest
summary_text: A commercial airliner suddenly reappears after being missing for five years. As those aboard reintegrate into society, they experience guiding voices and visions of events yet to occur, and soon a deeper mystery unfolds.

name: Luca
summary_text: On the Italian Riviera, an unlikely but strong friendship grows between a human being and a sea monster disguised as a human.

name: Cruella
summary_text: A live-action prequel feature film following a young Cruella de Vil.

name: Mare of Easttown
summary_text: A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart.

name: Lupin
summary_text: Inspired by the adventures of Arsène Lupin, gentleman thief Assane Diop sets out to avenge his father for an injustice inflicted by a wealthy family.

name: Infinite
summary_text: A man discovers that his hallucinations are actually visions from past lives.

name: A Quiet Place Part II
summary_text: Following the events at home, the Abbott family now face the terrors of the outside world. Forced to venture into the unknown, they realize the creatures that hunt by sound are not the only threats lurking beyond the sand path.

name: Lucifer
summary_text: Lucifer Morningstar has decided he's had enough of being the dutiful servant in Hell and decides to spend some time on Earth to better understand humanity. He settles in Los Angeles - the City of Angels.

name: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It
summary_text: The Warrens investigate a murder that may be linked to a demonic possession.

name: Raya and the Last Dragon
summary_text: In a realm known as Kumandra, a re-imagined Earth inhabited by an ancient civilization, a warrior named Raya is determined to find the last dragon.

name: Game of Thrones
summary_text: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

name: Awake
summary_text: After a devastating global event wiped out all electronics and eliminated people's ability to sleep, a former soldier may have found a solution with her daughter.

name: F9: The Fast Saga
summary_text: Cipher enlists the help of Jakob, Dom's younger brother to take revenge on Dom and his team.

name: The Blacklist
summary_text: A new FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen, has her entire life uprooted when a mysterious criminal, Raymond Reddington, who has eluded capture for decades, turns himself in and insists on speaking only to her.

name: Friends
summary_text: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

name: StartUp
summary_text: A desperate banker, a Haitian-American gang lord and a Cuban-American hacker are forced to work together to unwittingly create their version of the American dream - organized crime 2.0.

name: The Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard
summary_text: The bodyguard Michael Bryce continues his friendship with assassin Darius Kincaid as they try to save Darius' wife Sonia.

name: iCarly
summary_text: A group of best friends creating a webcast while grappling with everyday problems and adventures.

name: The Walking Dead
summary_text: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

name: Time
summary_text: Eric is a prison officer who tries to protect those in his charge. When one of the most dangerous inmates identifies his weakness, Eric faces an impossible choice between his principles and his love for his family.

name: The Family Man
summary_text: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

name: Wrath of Man
summary_text: The plot follows H, a cold and mysterious character working at a cash truck company responsible for moving hundreds of millions of dollars around Los Angeles each week.

name: Grey's Anatomy
summary_text: A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.

name: Wish Dragon
summary_text: Determined teen Din is longing to reconnect with his childhood best friend when he meets a wish-granting dragon who shows him the magic of possibilities.

name: Katla
summary_text: One year after the violent eruption of the subglacial volcano Katla, the peace and tranquility in the small town of Vik is dramatically disturbed.

name: Hacks
summary_text: Explores a dark mentorship that forms between Deborah Vance, a legendary Las Vegas comedian, and an entitled, outcast 25-year-old.

name: Army of the Dead
summary_text: Following a zombie outbreak in Las Vegas, a group of mercenaries take the ultimate gamble, venturing into the quarantine zone to pull off the greatest heist ever attempted.

name: The Kominsky Method
summary_text: An aging actor, who long ago enjoyed a brush with fame, makes his living as an acting coach.

name: Kevin Can F**k Himself
summary_text: A look at the secret life of a sitcom wife.

name: See
summary_text: Far in a dystopian future, the human race has lost the sense of sight, and society has had to find new ways to interact, build, hunt, and to survive. All of that is challenged when a set of twins is born with sight.

name: Cruel Summer
summary_text: In a small Texas town a popular teen, Kate, is abducted. Seemingly unrelated, a girl, Jeanette, goes from being a sweet, awkward outlier to the most popular girl in town. By '95 she becomes the most despised person in America.

name: Breaking Bad
summary_text: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

name: The Tomorrow War
summary_text: A family man is drafted to fight in a future war where the fate of humanity relies on his ability to confront the past.

name: Black Summer
summary_text: In the dark, early days of a zombie apocalypse, complete strangers band together to find the strength they need to survive and get back to loved ones.

name: Nobody
summary_text: A bystander who intervenes to help a woman being harassed by a group of men becomes the target of a vengeful drug lord.

name: Physical
summary_text: A woman struggling in her life as a quietly tortured housewife, finds an unconventional path to power through an unlikely source: the world of aerobics.

name: Love, Victor
summary_text: Victor is a new student at Creekwood High School on his own journey of self-discovery, facing challenges at home, adjusting to a new city, and struggling with his sexual orientation.

name: Peaky Blinders
summary_text: A gangster family epic set in 1900s England, centering on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps, and their fierce boss Tommy Shelby.

name: Elite
summary_text: When three working-class teenagers begin attending an exclusive private school in Spain, the clash between them and the wealthy students leads to murder.

name: Clarkson's Farm
summary_text: Follow Jeremy Clarkson as he attempts to run a farm in the countryside.

name: Criminal Minds
summary_text: The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again.

name: A Quiet Place
summary_text: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

name: Yellowstone
summary_text: A ranching family in Montana faces off against others encroaching on their land.

name: Invincible
summary_text: An adult animated series based on the Skybound/Image comic about a teenager whose father is the most powerful superhero on the planet.

name: The Office
summary_text: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

name: Great White
summary_text: A fun filled flight to a remote atoll turns into a nightmare for five passengers when their seaplane is destroyed in a freak accident and they are trapped on a raft, 100 miles from shore with man-eating sharks lurking beneath the surface.

name: Vikings
summary_text: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore - and raid - the distant shores across the ocean.

name: The Misfits
summary_text: After being recruited by a group of unconventional thieves, renowned criminal Richard Pace finds himself caught up in an elaborate gold heist that promises to have far-reaching implications on his life and the lives of countless others.

name: Stranger Things
summary_text: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

name: The Flash
summary_text: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes up from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed, becoming the next Flash, fighting crime in Central City.

name: Downton Abbey
summary_text: A chronicle of the lives of the British aristocratic Crawley family and their servants in the early twentieth century.

name: The Boys
summary_text: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

name: Rick and Morty
summary_text: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.

name: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
summary_text: This series follows the Special Victims Unit, a specially trained squad of detectives in the N.Y.P.D., who investigate sexually related crimes.

name: Shadow and Bone
summary_text: Dark forces conspire against orphan mapmaker Alina Starkov when she unleashes an extraordinary power that could change the fate of her war-torn world.

name: Supernatural
summary_text: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons and gods that roam the earth.

name: Fatherhood
summary_text: A father brings up his baby girl as a single dad after the unexpected death of his wife who died a day after their daughter's birth.

name: The Sopranos
summary_text: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state, leading him to seek professional psychiatric counseling.

name: Dirty John
summary_text: Anthology series in which each season is based on a true crime story featuring an epic tale of love gone wrong.

name: WandaVision
summary_text: Blends the style of classic sitcoms with the MCU, in which Wanda Maximoff and Vision - two super-powered beings living their ideal suburban lives - begin to suspect that everything is not as it seems.

name: Black Widow
summary_text: A film about Natasha Romanoff in her quests between the films Civil War and Infinity War.

name: Fear the Walking Dead
summary_text: A Walking Dead spinoff set in Los Angeles, California. Follows two families who must band together to survive the undead apocalypse.

name: Why Women Kill
summary_text: An anthology series that follows three women in different decades all living in the same house, as they deal with infidelity and betrayals in their marriages.

name: Inside
summary_text: A new comedy special shot and performed by Bo Burnham, alone, over the course of the past year.

name: Gunpowder Milkshake
summary_text: Three generations of women fight back against those who could take everything from them.

name: Schitt's Creek
summary_text: When rich video-store magnate Johnny Rose and his family suddenly find themselves broke, they are forced to leave their pampered lives to regroup in Schitt's Creek.

name: Star Wars: The Bad Batch
summary_text: The 'Bad Batch' of elite and experimental clones make their way through an ever-changing galaxy in the immediate aftermath of the Clone Wars.

name: The Witcher
summary_text: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

name: Spiral
summary_text: A criminal mastermind unleashes a twisted form of justice in Spiral, the terrifying new chapter from the book of Saw.

name: Tenet
summary_text: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.

name: The Falcon and the Winter Soldier
summary_text: Following the events of 'Avengers: Endgame,' Sam Wilson/Falcon and Bucky Barnes/Winter Soldier team up in a global adventure that tests their abilities -- and their patience.

name: Pig
summary_text: A truffle hunter who lives alone in the Oregonian wilderness must return to his past in Portland in search of his beloved foraging pig after she is kidnapped.

name: NCIS
summary_text: The cases of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service's Washington, D.C. Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs.

name: Ragnarok
summary_text: A small Norwegian town experiencing warm winters and violent downpours seems to be headed for another Ragnarok -- unless someone intervenes in time.

name: Money Heist
summary_text: An unusual group of robbers attempt to carry out the most perfect robbery in Spanish history - stealing 2.4 billion euros from the Royal Mint of Spain.

name: Modern Family
summary_text: Three different but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.

name: Line of Duty
summary_text: Drama series following the investigations of AC-12, a controversial police anti-corruption unit.

name: Godzilla vs. Kong
summary_text: The epic next chapter in the cinematic Monsterverse pits two of the greatest icons in motion picture history against one another - the fearsome Godzilla and the mighty Kong - with humanity caught in the balance.

name: Blindspotting
summary_text: As Ashley's partner of 12 years and father of their son, Miles is suddenly incarcerated, leaving her to navigate a chaotic and humorous existential crisis when she's forced to move in with Miles' mother and half-sister.

name: Dexter
summary_text: By day, mild-mannered Dexter is a blood-spatter analyst for the Miami police. But at night, he is a serial killer who only targets other murderers.

name: Attack on Titan
summary_text: After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

name: Outlander
summary_text: An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743.

name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
summary_text: Comedy series following the exploits of Det. Jake Peralta and his diverse, lovable colleagues as they police the NYPD's 99th Precinct.

name: Superman and Lois
summary_text: Follow the world's most famous super hero and comic books' most famous journalist as they deal with all the stress, pressures, and complexities that come with being working parents in today's society.

name: Lisey's Story
summary_text: A widow becomes the object of a dangerous stalker, obsessed with her husband's work.

name: Panic
summary_text: No one knows who invented Panic or when it first began. But in the forgotten rural town of Carp, Texas, the game is the only way out. Every summer the graduating seniors risk their lives competing in a series of challenges that force them to confront their deepest fears for the chance to win life-changing money. Anyone can play. Only one will win. Let the games begin.

name: The Big Bang Theory
summary_text: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

name: Workin' Moms
summary_text: Four very different thirtysomething working-mother friends try to balance their jobs, family lives, and love lives in modern-day Toronto, Canada.

name: The Mandalorian
summary_text: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

name: Dave
summary_text: A neurotic mid 20's suburbanite's convinced he's destined to be one of the greatest rappers of all time. Now he's got to prove it to everyone else.

name: Bosch
summary_text: An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer.

name: Masters of the Universe: Revelation
summary_text: The war for Eternia begins again in what may be the final battle between He-Man and Skeletor. A new animated series from writer-director Kevin Smith.

name: American Horror Story
summary_text: An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show circus, a haunted hotel, a possessed farmhouse, a cult, the apocalypse, and a slasher summer camp.

name: The Devil Below
summary_text: A group of four amateur adventurers who specialize in exploring remote and forsaken places pay a visit to Shookum Hills, a town in the remote Appalachian Mountains, which was abandoned decades ago due to a mysterious coal mine fire.

name: Mythic Quest: Raven's Banquet
summary_text: The owner of a successful video game design company and his troubled staff struggle to keep their hit game 'Mythic Quest' on top.

name: 365 Days
summary_text: Massimo is a member of the Sicilian Mafia family and Laura is a sales director. She does not expect that on a trip to Sicily trying to save her relationship, Massimo will kidnap her and give her 365 days to fall in love with him.

name: Trese
summary_text: Set in Manila where the mythical creatures of Philippine folklore live in hiding amongst humans, Alexandra Trese finds herself going head to head with a criminal underworld comprised of malevolent supernatural beings.

name: Better Call Saul
summary_text: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill in the time before he established his strip-mall law office in Albuquerque, New Mexico.

name: tick, tick...Boom!
summary_text: On the cusp of his 30th birthday, a promising young theater composer navigates love, friendship, and the pressures of life as an artist in New York City.

name: Believe Me: The Abduction of Lisa McVey
summary_text: On the night she plans on taking her own life, a 17-year-old girl is kidnapped and finds herself fighting to stay alive. She manages to talk her attacker into releasing her, but when she ...                See full summary »

name: Shameless
summary_text: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

name: The Conjuring
summary_text: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

name: Fargo
summary_text: Various chronicles of deception, intrigue and murder in and around frozen Minnesota. Yet all of these tales mysteriously lead back one way or another to Fargo, North Dakota.

name: Lost
summary_text: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.

name: The Morning Show
summary_text: An inside look at the lives of the people who help America wake up in the morning, exploring the unique challenges faced by the men and women who carry out this daily televised ritual.

name: Space Jam: A New Legacy
summary_text: NBA superstar LeBron James teams up with Bugs Bunny and the rest of the Looney Tunes for this long-awaited sequel.

name: Promising Young Woman
summary_text: A young woman, traumatized by a tragic event in her past, seeks out vengeance against those who crossed her path.

name: Black Mirror
summary_text: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

name: The Hitman's Bodyguard
summary_text: The world's top bodyguard gets a new client, a hitman who must testify at the International Criminal Court. They must put their differences aside and work together to make it to the trial on time.

name: Ted Lasso
summary_text: Follows U.S. American football coach Ted Lasso who heads to the U.K. to manage a struggling London football team in the top flight of English football.

name: Younger
summary_text: After being mistaken for younger than she really is, a single mother decides to take the chance to reboot her career and her love life as a 26-year old.

name: Flack
summary_text: Robyn, an American publicist working for a cutthroat London PR company that represents troubled celebrities, is adept at keeping her clients' lives appearing in perfect order, while her own falls to pieces.

name: Those Who Wish Me Dead
summary_text: A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all.

name: Deliverance
summary_text: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

name: Gone Girl
summary_text: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

name: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
summary_text: Five friends with big egos and small brains are the proprietors of an Irish pub in Philadelphia.

name: Queen of the South
summary_text: Teresa flees Mexico after her drug-runner boyfriend is murdered. Settling in Dallas she looks to become the country's reigning drug smuggler and to avenge her lover's murder.

name: The Father
summary_text: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages. As he tries to make sense of his changing circumstances, he begins to doubt his loved ones, his own mind and even the fabric of his reality.

name: Zack Snyder's Justice League
summary_text: Determined to ensure Superman's ultimate sacrifice was not in vain, Bruce Wayne aligns forces with Diana Prince with plans to recruit a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions.

name: The Nevers
summary_text: An epic tale following a gang of Victorian women who find themselves with unusual abilities, relentless enemies, and a mission that might change the world.

name: The Good Doctor
summary_text: Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.

name: The Crown
summary_text: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the twentieth century.

name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
summary_text: A continuation of Spider-Man: Far From Home.

name: Feel Good
summary_text: The series follows recovering addict and comedian Mae, who is trying to control the addictive behaviors and intense romanticism that permeate every facet of her life.

name: The Shawshank Redemption
summary_text: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

name: Chicago Fire
summary_text: The story of firefighters and paramedics in the city of Chicago, both on a personal and professional level.

name: Harley Quinn
summary_text: The series focuses on a single Harley Quinn, who sets off to make it on her own in Gotham City.

name: Doctor Who
summary_text: The further adventures in time and space of the alien adventurer known as the Doctor and their companions from planet Earth.

name: Jupiter's Legacy
summary_text: The first generation of superheroes has kept the world safe for nearly a century. Now their children must live up to their legacy in an epic drama that spans decades and navigates the dynamics of family, power and loyalty.

name: Cocktail
summary_text: A talented New York City bartender takes a job at a bar in Jamaica and falls in love.

name: The Vampire Diaries
summary_text: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

name: Ozark
summary_text: A financial advisor drags his family from Chicago to the Missouri Ozarks, where he must launder money to appease a drug boss.

name: Dune
summary_text: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel, about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

name: Suits
summary_text: On the run from a drug deal gone bad, brilliant college dropout Mike Ross finds himself working with Harvey Specter, one of New York City's best lawyers.

name: Home Before Dark
summary_text: A young girl from the big city uncovers clues to an unsolved cold case while visiting her father's small lakeside town.

name: How I Met Your Mother
summary_text: A father recounts to his children - through a series of flashbacks - the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.

name: This Is Us
summary_text: A heartwarming and emotional story about a unique set of triplets, their struggles and their wonderful parents.

name: The 100
summary_text: Set ninety-seven years after a nuclear war has destroyed civilization, when a spaceship housing humanity's lone survivors sends one hundred juvenile delinquents back to Earth, in hopes of possibly re-populating the planet.

name: Mortal Kombat
summary_text: MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe.

name: Avengers: Endgame
summary_text: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

name: The Little Things
summary_text: Kern County Deputy Sheriff Joe Deacon is sent to Los Angeles for what should have been a quick evidence-gathering assignment. Instead, he becomes embroiled in the search for a serial killer who is terrorizing the city.

name: New Amsterdam
summary_text: A new medical director breaks the rules to heal the system at America's oldest public hospital.

name: S.W.A.T.
summary_text: Follows a locally born and bred S.W.A.T. sergeant and his team of highly-trained men and women as they solve crimes in Los Angeles.

name: Sherni
summary_text: An upright Forest Officer who strives for balance in a world of man-animal conflict while she also seeks her true calling in a hostile environment.

name: The Woman in the Window
summary_text: An agoraphobic woman living alone in New York begins spying on her new neighbors, only to witness a disturbing act of violence.

name: Bones
summary_text: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.

name: The Wire
summary_text: The Baltimore drug scene, as seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.

name: Virgin River
summary_text: Seeking a fresh start, nurse practitioner Melinda Monroe moves from Los Angeles to a remote Northern California town and is surprised by what and who she finds.

name: War of the Worlds
summary_text: Set in contemporary France, this Anglo-French reimagining of H. G. Wells' classic in the style of Walking Dead follows pockets of survivors forced to team up after an apocalyptic extra-terrestrial strike.

name: The Last Kingdom
summary_text: As Alfred the Great defends his kingdom from Norse invaders, Uhtred - born a Saxon but raised by Vikings - seeks to claim his ancestral birthright.

name: New Girl
summary_text: After a bad break-up, Jess, an offbeat young woman, moves into an apartment loft with three single men. Although they find her behavior very unusual, the men support her - most of the time.

name: The Mitchells vs the Machines
summary_text: A quirky, dysfunctional family's road trip is upended when they find themselves in the middle of the robot apocalypse and suddenly become humanity's unlikeliest last hope.

name: L.A.'s Finest
summary_text: The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department.

name: Westworld
summary_text: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite can be indulged without consequence.

name: Sons of Anarchy
summary_text: A biker struggles to balance being a father and being involved in an outlaw motorcycle club.

name: Sunflower
summary_text: A quirky murder mystery based in a housing society called Sunflower. Its simpleton resident Sonu dives headlong into a murder mystery and becomes the chief suspect. What happens next?

name: Community
summary_text: A suspended lawyer is forced to enroll in a community college with an eccentric staff and student body.

name: DC's Legends of Tomorrow
summary_text: Time-travelling rogue Rip Hunter has to recruit a rag-tag team of heroes and villains to help prevent an apocalypse that could impact not only Earth, but all of time.

name: Kids
summary_text: A day in the life of a group of teens as they travel around New York City skating, drinking, smoking and deflowering virgins.

name: Untitled Indiana Jones Project
summary_text: The plot is unknown at this time.

name: Midsomer Murders
summary_text: A veteran Detective Chief Inspector and his young Sergeant investigate murders around the regional community of Midsomer County.

name: Stand by Me
summary_text: After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

name: House M.D.
summary_text: An antisocial maverick doctor who specializes in diagnostic medicine does whatever it takes to solve puzzling cases that come his way using his crack team of doctors and his wits.

name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
summary_text: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

name: True Detective
summary_text: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

name: Censor
summary_text: After viewing a strangely familiar video nasty, Enid, a film censor, sets out to solve the past mystery of her sister's disappearance, embarking on a quest that dissolves the line between fiction and reality.

name: Midsommar
summary_text: A couple travels to Scandinavia to visit a rural hometown's fabled Swedish mid-summer festival. What begins as an idyllic retreat quickly devolves into an increasingly violent and bizarre competition at the hands of a pagan cult.

name: Skater Girl
summary_text: When a teen in rural India discovers a life-changing passion for skateboarding, she faces a rough road as she follows her dream to compete.

name: Once Upon a Time... In Hollywood
summary_text: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age in 1969 Los Angeles.

name: The Mosquito Coast
summary_text: An idealist uproots his family and moves them to Latin America.

name: Old
summary_text: A thriller about a family on a tropical holiday who discover that the secluded beach where they are relaxing for a few hours is somehow causing them to age rapidly reducing their entire lives into a single day.

name: Nomadland
summary_text: A woman in her sixties, after losing everything in the Great Recession, embarks on a journey through the American West, living as a van-dwelling modern-day nomad.

name: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
summary_text: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

name: The Expanse
summary_text: In the 24th century, a disparate band of antiheroes unravel a vast conspiracy that threatens the Solar System's fragile state of cold war.

name: 2 Hearts
summary_text: For two couples the future unfolds in different decades and different places, but a hidden connection will bring them together in a way no one could have predicted.

name: Gilmore Girls
summary_text: A dramedy centering around the relationship between a thirtysomething single mother and her teen daughter living in Stars Hollow, Connecticut.

name: The X-Files
summary_text: Two F.B.I. Agents, Fox Mulder the believer and Dana Scully the skeptic, investigate the strange and unexplained, while hidden forces work to impede their efforts.

name: Star Trek: The Next Generation
summary_text: Set almost 100 years after Captain Kirk's five-year mission, a new generation of Starfleet officers set off in the U.S.S. Enterprise-D on their own mission to go where no one has gone before.

name: Titans
summary_text: A team of young superheroes combat evil and other perils.

name: The Queen's Gambit
summary_text: Orphaned at the tender age of nine, prodigious introvert Beth Harmon discovers and masters the game of chess in 1960s USA. But child stardom comes at a price.

name: The Big Lebowski
summary_text: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

name: The Suicide Squad
summary_text: Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X as they are dropped off at the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese.

name: Jurassic World: Dominion
summary_text: Plot kept under wraps.

name: Love, Death & Robots
summary_text: A collection of animated short stories that span various genres including science fiction, fantasy, horror and comedy.

name: Happy Endings
summary_text: This Chicago-set sitcom follows the intertwined lives of six young urbanites trying to learn the ropes of adulthood. Through breakups and whatever other curve-balls life throws them, the pals stick together.

name: The Matrix 4
summary_text: The plot is currently unknown.

name: Sex Education
summary_text: A teenage boy with a sex therapist mother teams up with a high school classmate to set up an underground sex therapy clinic at school.

name: Free Guy
summary_text: A bank teller discovers that he's actually an NPC inside a brutal, open world video game.

name: Parks and Recreation
summary_text: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

name: Heartland
summary_text: A multi-generational saga set in Alberta, Canada and centered on a family getting through life together in both happy and trying times.

name: The Conjuring 2
summary_text: Ed and Lorraine Warren travel to North London to help a single mother raising four children alone in a house plagued by a supernatural spirit.

name: The Unholy
summary_text: A hearing-impaired girl is visited by the Virgin Mary and can suddenly hear, speak, and heal the sick. As people flock to witness her miracles, terrifying events unfold. Are they the work of the Virgin Mary or something much more sinister?

name: The Bold Type
summary_text: A glimpse into the outrageous lives and loves of those responsible for a global women's magazine.

name: The Girl Next Door
summary_text: A teenager's dreams come true when a former porn star moves in next door and they fall in love.

name: Superstore
summary_text: A look at the lives of employees at a big box store.

name: The Godfather
summary_text: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

name: Record of Ragnarok
summary_text: Every 1000 years, the Gods' Council assemble to decide the fate of humanity. After 7 million years of human history, the gods come to the decision that humans are irredeemable and must be extinct.

name: Thor: Love and Thunder
summary_text: The sequel to Thor: Ragnarok and the fourth movie in the Thor saga.

name: Cobra Kai
summary_text: Decades after their 1984 All Valley Karate Tournament bout, a middle-aged Daniel LaRusso and Johnny Lawrence find themselves martial-arts rivals again.

name: Rogue Hostage
summary_text: Single father and former Marine Kyle Snowden, on a routine stop for his job in Child Protective Services, finds himself and a group of innocent customers trapped inside his stepfather's store.

name: Hamilton
summary_text: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

name: The Rookie
summary_text: Starting over isn't easy, especially for John Nolan who, after a life-altering incident, is pursuing his dream of joining the LAPD. As their oldest rookie, he's met with skepticism from those who see him as just a walking midlife crisis.

name: Greenland
summary_text: A family struggles for survival in the face of a cataclysmic natural disaster.

name: Legacies
summary_text: Hope Mikaelson, a tribrid daughter of a Vampire/Werewolf hybrid, makes her way in the world.

name: Euphoria
summary_text: A look at life for a group of high school students as they grapple with issues of drugs, sex, and violence.

name: Castlevania
summary_text: A vampire hunter fights to save a besieged city from an army of otherworldly creatures controlled by Dracula.

name: Bridgerton
summary_text: Wealth, lust, and betrayal set against the backdrop of Regency-era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

name: Seinfeld
summary_text: The continuing misadventures of neurotic New York City stand-up comedian Jerry Seinfeld and his equally neurotic New York City friends.

name: Gossip Girl
summary_text: Reboot of the TV series centering on a new generation of New York private school teens using social media to spread gossip.

name: Voyagers
summary_text: A crew of astronauts on a multi-generational mission descend into paranoia and madness, not knowing what is real or not.

name: The Birthday Cake
summary_text: On the 10th anniversary of his father's death, Giovanni reluctantly accepts the task of bringing a cake to the home of his uncle, a mob boss, for a celebration. Just two hours into the night, Gio's life is forever changed.

name: Dark
summary_text: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town, where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

name: Mad Men
summary_text: A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper.

name: A Perfect Enemy
summary_text: A successful architect is approached on his trip to the Paris Airport by a chatty girl. Although the meeting seems fortuitous, soon there be a turn that will transform the encounter into something much more sinister and criminal.

name: Mr Inbetween
summary_text: In Mr Inbetween, Ryan plays "Ray Shoesmith," a father, ex-husband, boyfriend and best friend: tough roles to juggle in the modern age. Even harder when you're a criminal for hire.

name: Billions
summary_text: U.S. Attorney Chuck Rhoades goes after hedge fund king Bobby "Axe" Axelrod in a battle between two powerful New York figures.

name: Chernobyl
summary_text: In April 1986, an explosion at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics becomes one of the world's worst man-made catastrophes.

name: One Piece
summary_text: Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger. The famous mystery treasure named "One Piece".

name: Kim's Convenience
summary_text: The misadventures of a Korean-Canadian family running a convenience store.

name: Friends: The Reunion
summary_text: An unscripted Friends reunion special.

name: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
summary_text: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never "done the deed" only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.

name: Wonder Woman 1984
summary_text: Diana must contend with a work colleague and businessman, whose desire for extreme wealth sends the world down a path of destruction, after an ancient artifact that grants wishes goes missing.

name: The Simpsons
summary_text: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.

name: My Hero Academia
summary_text: A superhero-loving boy without any powers is determined to enroll in a prestigious hero academy and learn what it really means to be a hero.

name: Prison Break
summary_text: Due to a political conspiracy, an innocent man is sent to death row and his only hope is his brother, who makes it his mission to deliberately get himself sent to the same prison in order to break the both of them out, from the inside.
Explores the high-pressure experiences of the first responders who are thrust into the most frightening, shocking and heart-stopping situations.

name: Jagame Thandhiram
summary_text: A nomadic gangster finds himself caught between good and evil in a fight for a place to call home. Starring Dhanush, Aishwarya Lekshmi and James Cosmo.

name: Chicago P.D.
summary_text: Follows District 21 of the Chicago Police Department, which is made up of two distinctly different groups: the uniformed cops and the Intelligence Unit.

name: BoJack Horseman
summary_text: BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit television show "Horsin' Around" in the '80s and '90s, but now he's washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.

name: iCarly
summary_text: Carly hosts her own home-grown web show, iCarly, Carly and sidekick Sam's regular webcasts ultimately feature everything from comedy sketches and talent contests to interviews, recipes, and problem-solving.

name: The Forever Purge
summary_text: All the rules are broken as a sect of lawless marauders decides that the annual Purge does not stop at daybreak and instead should never end.

name: Scrubs
summary_text: In the unreal world of Sacred Heart Hospital, intern John "J.D." Dorian learns the ways of medicine, friendship and life.

name: Once Upon a Time
summary_text: A young woman with a troubled past is drawn to a small town in Maine where fairy tales are to be believed.

name: Halston
summary_text: The story of a man who leverages his single, invented name into a worldwide fashion empire that's synonymous with luxury, sex, status and fame, literally defining the era.

name: Chaos Walking
summary_text: Two unlikely companions embark on a perilous adventure through the badlands of an unexplored planet as they try to escape a dangerous and disorienting reality, where all inner thoughts are seen and heard by everyone.

name: Peter Rabbit 2: The Runaway
summary_text: Thomas and Bea are now married and living with Peter and his rabbit family. Bored of life in the garden, Peter goes to the big city, where he meets shady characters and ends up creating chaos for the whole family.

name: Law & Order
summary_text: Follows a crime (usually a murder), usually adapted from current headlines, from two separate vantage points, the police investigation and the prosecution in court.

name: Titanic
summary_text: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

name: Homeland
summary_text: A bipolar CIA operative becomes convinced a prisoner of war has been turned by al-Qaeda and is planning to carry out a terrorist attack on American soil.

name: Clarice
summary_text: A look at the untold personal story of FBI agent Clarice Starling, as she returns to the field about a year after the events of The Silence of the Lambs (1991).

name: Batwoman
summary_text: Batwoman seeks justice for Gotham City.

name: Orange Is the New Black
summary_text: Convicted of a decade old crime of transporting drug money to an ex-girlfriend, normally law-abiding Piper Chapman is sentenced to a year and a half behind bars to face the reality of how life-changing prison can really be.

name: A Million Little Things
summary_text: A group of friends becomes motivated to living fuller lives after the unexpected death of a close friend.

name: Willy's Wonderland
summary_text: A quiet drifter is tricked into a janitorial job at the now condemned Willy's Wonderland. The mundane tasks suddenly become an all-out fight for survival against wave after wave of demonic animatronics. Fists fly, kicks land, titans clash -- and only one side will make it out alive.

name: Hawaii Five-0
summary_text: Steve McGarrett returns home to Oahu in order to find his father's killer; The Governor offers him the chance to run his own task force - Five-0.

name: Big Shot
summary_text: A temperamental college basketball coach who gets fired from his job and must take a teaching and coaching job at an elite all-girls private high school.
